comp_2=`{
comp_3=`//uv = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*0.94;
comp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*6;
comp_5=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ).y;
comp_6=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ).y;
comp_7=`    float2 uv_y = uv-float2(dx,dy)*0.6;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`ret = lerp(float3(0.4,0.2,0.9)*tex2D(sampler_fc_main, uv_y).x,

comp_12=`}
